title: Heera-Moti Chandbali - Polki Diamond and Pearl Ear Pendant
materials: Emerald Beads. The gold showcases a delicate Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This Chandbali features an intricate crescent moon shape meticulously adorned with uncut Polki diamonds (Heera). The design incorporates traditional South Indian craftsmanship, enhanced by delicate emerald bead and pearl (Moti) drops. The setting highlights the natural beauty of the Polki diamonds. Each pearl is carefully selected for its luster and shape.
colors: and Iridescent White (Pearls). This color combination embodies classic South Indian elegance.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham or Half-Saree functions. Also suitable for adding a touch of heritage to modern celebrations.
description: This Chandbali showcases authentic South Indian artistry with genuine Polki diamonds. Its timeless design ensures it remains a cherished heirloom for generations. The combination of diamonds, pearls, and emeralds symbolizes prosperity, purity, and new beginnings. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees enduring shine and protection.
